transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to change in some ways. Many people are leaving the Church because it is not accepting of some things. This includes gay marriage, abortion, and birth control. The Church has strong views on these issues, but they are old-fashioned. If the Church changed its views, it might not lose followers. 

Some people are unhappy with the Church because it does not agree with them on certain issues. For example, the Church is against abortion. If you support abortion, you may not want to be part of a Church that says it is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage and other issues. You may not want to be in a Church that does not agree with your beliefs.

The Church does not allow women to be priests or priests to be married. However, this may not have prevented the problems the Church faces. It is hard to say. 

I do not see why priests cannot be married. The Church says priests are married to God and devoted to their work. But other people have jobs and families too. I do not see why priests cannot have both.

I am not against gay marriage. I think people should not be judged for their sexual orientation. They are born this way. It's not something they choose. I believe it's wrong to say some people can get married and others cannot, just because of who they are. I haven't thought about this a lot, but I think it's wrong to treat people unfairly like this.

I think people are not in control of who they are attracted to. Some are born straight and some are born gay. They should not be blamed for this. If someone is born with a condition, we don't blame them, do we?

I don't think the federal government should get involved in something like this. It's not a matter of law, but rather a matter of treating people fairly. I don't think it's right for the government to tell people who they can and cannot marry.

The government should not interfere in people's personal lives. They should not judge people for who they are. People are born gay, and that's okay. They should not be punished for this.

I think gay marriage should be legal. 

There is no good reason not to. 

Some people think that gay couples are a threat to the traditional family. But this is not true. 

Gay couples are different, and they have different needs. They should have the same rights as everyone else. 

There are many civil rights that come with gay marriage, like the right to own property and to get medical care when you are sick. 

If you are gay, your partner cannot be with you in the hospital. This is not fair. 

Many studies have shown that gay couples are just like straight couples. They have the same kind of relationships and the same kind of problems. 

The main issue is that some people do not want to allow gay couples to get married because of their religion. But this is not a reason to deny them their rights. 

If you are not allowed to get married in a church, why can't you get a marriage certificate from the government? 

It's like segregation - separate but not equal. 

Some people are worried about adoption and how gay couples will affect their community. But they should not be. 

Gay couples are the same as straight couples in many ways. They have the same kind of relationships and the same kinds of problems. 

They can be good parents and good members of their community. 

The government should help make gay marriage legal in all states. 

President Bush and some other people have strong feelings about this issue because of their religion. But this is not a good reason to deny gay couples their rights. 

Everyone should be treated equally, no matter what they believe.

I work in a hospital pharmacy during the summer. I think the fact that a drug is against the law does not mean it has good qualities. I do not think making it available to the public is a good idea. However, I think it could be beneficial if used for medical reasons. If a medicine is good, its lawfulness should not stop its use.

Some medicines that are against the law, like oxycodone and vicodin, are used in pharmacies. We use them because they are good for people. If we do not use them because of a bad image, it is not fair. I think we should accept the good qualities of marijuana, too.

Using too much marijuana can be bad, but using too much alcohol can also cause problems. It is a difficult issue. I think it would be a good idea to make marijuana legal gradually, not all at once. This way, people might use it responsibly.

People have a bad opinion of marijuana because it is against the law. But it is not as bad as heroin or cocaine. If we change our opinion of marijuana, people might use it sensibly, especially for medical reasons.

I think the church has changed a lot since the 21st century. It's not as strict as it used to be. I grew up going to church every Sunday as a child. I wore cute dresses and matching shoes. I attended a private school and saw my friends at church on weekends. But now, the church has made some changes. They have a 30-minute mass for teenagers. People dress more casually, especially in the summer. They wear beach clothes or jeans and khakis.

I think this is the biggest change I've noticed. I don't know much about the church's politics, but that's how I see it. Some people may think that if the church allowed female priests or priests to marry, these problems could have been prevented. But I don't think that's true. There are married men who still become pedophiles. It's not because they're allowed to get married or not. It's the person themselves.

Some other religions already allow priests to be married. For example, Seventh-day Adventists have reverends who can get married. If someone wants to practice their faith and be married, they might choose a different church. I think the church couldn't have prevented these problems. Maybe the church just didn't know about the abuse or tried to hide it. But it's not because of the rules they have.

I also think that pedophilia is based on genetics. People are born that way. It's not because of how they were raised. While it's true that environment can play a role, I don't think it's the main reason. You can't hide someone's true nature through a marriage. If they have these feelings, they will usually come out.

If the church knew about the abuse and tried to cover it up, that's a problem. But I don't think that was always the case. I don't have any other thoughts on the Catholic Church.

I was not happy with the reason for going to war in Iraq. Many people were still upset about the September 11th attacks. The Bush administration said we went to war because of these attacks and because Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction. But this has since been proved false.

I think the Bush administration lied to the American people. They said something that was not true. Colin Powell, a high-ranking official, even said he was not sure about the evidence when he presented it to the United Nations.

I think this is very bad. It is against the rules of being in office. It is an impeachable offense. The Bush administration does not respect the laws of the country. They have not done what they said they would do since September 11th.

I think they wanted to go to war from the beginning. A former official said this in a book. He said that President Bush wanted to go to war because his father had problems with Saddam Hussein.

Now, the war has gone on too long. If we leave now, there may be problems. Many people will die. The United Nations and the United States are trying a new plan. They want to work with nearby countries like Syria and Saudi Arabia to bring order to Iraq. But I think this may cause more problems in the long run.

Iraq will have trouble being in control of its own country. The government is not working well. The Prime Minister does not have control. A group called the Parliament is not working well either. There are many people who do not agree with each other.

I have thoughts about the war in Iraq. 

At first, I think the war was not a good idea. There was no official declaration of war. It started as a way to punish Iraq for the terrorist attacks on September 11. 

Now, our goal is to build democracy in Iraq. We also want to get oil from them. However, we are making many people unhappy. 

If we stay there, we will have to create democracy, which is a long process. If we leave, Iraq will be angry with us. They will have to start over from the beginning. 

I do not know much about the war. I think the war should not continue. We should stop using guns to show our power. 

The war was not officially declared by Congress. We must declare war before we start fighting. 

I think we should stay in Iraq and help them. But this is wasting our resources. The war is also making President Bush look bad. 

The Vietnam War was also an undeclared war. It is now called a meaningless war. I do not want President Bush to be remembered as the president who started a meaningless war. 

It is hard to decide what to do. Many people I know have family members in the army in Iraq. I want the war to end because it is making their lives difficult. However, if we leave, we may make things worse for Iraq. 

We are trying to change their culture, but it may not work. The Al-Kaida group may become stronger and hate the U.S. more. 

I think this war will continue for a long time. It is a difficult problem to solve.

I do not think it is right for a state to make something legal or illegal. The constitution says there should be a separation of church and state. This is clear. It is clearly stated in the constitution. Trying to make a law about it would go against what is already said.

I think people who want to make it illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over another. Most Catholics and Christians do not support it. But I do not think the government should decide what the churches can and cannot make law about.

Separation of church and state is an important part of the constitution. It helps us have more freedom in the United States. Making an amendment about it would be wrong and go against what is already written in the constitution.

I also think it is one of the only amendments that would limit the people, not the government. So I do not think it is right.

I do not think the government should be involved in this issue. The president is pushing for this amendment because of his own personal beliefs as a Catholic. He is showing that he prefers one religion over others. I think it is up to the churches to decide, not the president or the government.

There is no good reason to make an amendment banning it. It is not good for the economy. It might even help society. I think that is a better use of our time than making a law about it.

I have said most of what I want to say.

The war in Iraq was not a good thing. The government did not tell the American people the truth about why they wanted to go to war. They made it seem like Iraq was connected to the terrorist attacks on September 11th, but that was not true. The government wanted to start the war in 2003, and many Americans did not agree.

I am against war, especially a war that is not necessary. The US government should not have started the war in Iraq. It was like the Vietnam War, where the US government made mistakes. Many American soldiers died in the war, and that was very sad.

The US government removed the Iraqi government, but they did not plan for what would happen after that. They thought it would be easy to create a new government, but it was not. The US government should have learned from past mistakes.

The US government wanted to create a democratic government in Iraq, but that was not an easy task. It is not easy to create a new government, and it takes a long time. The US government made it seem like it would be easy, but it was not.

I had mixed feelings about the war in Iraq. I was thinking about voting in the 2004 presidential election, and one of my reasons for voting for George Bush was to let him finish what he started. But then I thought about the many American soldiers who died in the war, and I wondered if it was worth it.

The US government said they were going to Iraq to make it a democratic nation, but I am not sure why they only wanted to do that in Iraq. Why not in other countries too? I think it is because of the oil. The US wants to control the oil in Iraq, and that is why they went to war.

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction, but they never found any. North Korea had weapons of mass destruction, but the US did not go to war with them. I think the US government is not being honest in their decisions.

I hope the war in Iraq ends soon and there is peace in the country. But I do not think that will happen soon.

I am for gay marriage. I have always been. I think it is a personal preference. Science has shown that being gay may be biological, not just a matter of how people are raised. People are not responsible for their sexual orientation. I think it is unfair to deny them the right to marry because of something they cannot control.

I do not think government should be involved in this issue. Marriage is a personal matter, not a government decision. It is not a state issue, it is a personal one. In my neighborhood, I know of two or three gay couples who are not married. They live like any other family. They walk their dogs and live their lives like anyone else.

I think it is wrong for the government to try to decide what marriage means. It is not their place to interpret what marriage is. I think it is ridiculous for someone like President Bush to try to decide what marriage is.

I have read and heard that being gay may be caused by a chemical in the brain. It may be something people are born with, not something they develop because of their environment. This is different from being gay because of how they are raised.

The only reason I can think of to not allow gay marriage is that it may be seen as different. If a man and a woman want to get married, they can do it privately in Las Vegas. But if two gay people want to get married, it will be on the front page of the news. I think it should be a private matter, not a public one.

When you put something on the internet, it is public. Anyone can see it. You cannot control who sees what you write. 

As a resident advisor (R.A.), I have already dealt with this issue. When you put something online, it can affect people's opinions of you. If you talk about violence or bad things happening, people might react. You should not put that online.

The internet is for everyone to see. If you are friends with someone on a social media site like Myspace, you might see what they write. But it is not the school's job to check what you write. However, if someone tells the school about something you wrote, they must act. They cannot ignore it because something bad might happen.

We had a situation at school where someone heard someone saying something. They reported it to the school, and we found out who said it. A friend of the person looked at their Facebook and was worried because of some things they wrote. The person thought it was a joke, but it became serious.

When you put something online, you have no privacy. If you don't want people to see it, don't put it online. You cannot control what people think or believe. School officials should not look at what you write on the internet without a good reason. But if someone brings it to their attention, they have to take it seriously.

I don't think school officials should be friends with students on social media. But if someone tells them something, they must act. School officials should not listen to phone conversations or read private messages without a good reason.

A teacher should not make a fake account to be friends with their students. That is not right. As a resident advisor, I don't want to know if my residents are doing something they shouldn't be doing and then posting it online. I don't want to have to deal with it.

I think the war has gone on for too long. I believe the purpose was good at first. We wanted to help another country have a democracy. But now, I think we're fighting just for the sake of fighting. It's like we want to prove we're a strong nation. I'm not sure the reasons for the war were fair. There were personal problems with the leader of Iraq. George Bush's father had conflicts with Saddam Hussein. If we were fighting for democracy, it would be good. But I don't think our reason for the war is fair now.

I think we made our point in the first few months. The war was a statement. But it's been going on for many years. I think it's too long. If we wanted to give democracy to a country ruled by a dictator, that would be a good reason for the war. But I don't think that's our reason anymore. I think we're fighting just to fight.

I think the war has lasted too long. The country we're fighting to help should now be able to govern itself. We're spending a lot of money on the war. We have problems at home, like poverty. We should be spending money on those problems. The war is also hurting our economy. There are other important things we should be spending money on, like public roads and schools. I think the money would be better spent on our own country's needs.

We're spending billions of dollars on the war. War shouldn't be a long-term expense. We have many problems at home that need to be solved. We should be spending money on things like healthcare, which is very important. Instead, we're spending money to kill our own citizens in a war we're losing.

I have a question. Do you want me to clarify something?

It happened because someone looked online and found something. They went to a website called Myspace. When you put information on the internet, you must understand that many people can see it. On Myspace, you have to be friends with someone to see their profile. But when you accept someone as a friend, you are giving them permission to see your profile.

Anytime you put information on the internet, you need to know that many people will see it. So, I think it's good that someone saw that information and was able to prevent a life from being lost.

However, it's a problem if one person looks at everyone's profiles all the time. That is not fair. It's like looking at people and deciding who is good or bad. That's not right.

I don't think it's right to have someone's job be to look at people's profiles. But it depends on why they looked at the profile. Were they looking for something specific or just looking at people's profiles randomly?

I don't have a Myspace account, but I have a Facebook account. It worries me that there are people who can see things about me. I saw a show on TV about a man who wanted to prove how easy it is to get information about people. He went onto a girl's profile and got her screen name in less than a minute. He even talked to her on instant messenger.

It's hard because people you don't know can talk to you and know things about you. They can even see your photos and know where you are during the day. It's a problem because you think you're safe, but you're not.

I try to limit what I put on Facebook, but I don't want to limit it too much. I want to be able to talk to my friends. It's a tricky issue because you never know who can see what.

My roommate told me that her high school banned Myspace. I don't understand how the school officials had the right to tell students they couldn't have Myspace. That's a question of privacy.

The Iraq War is a topic I do not like to discuss. I feel bad talking about it because many people already know my opinion. I was against the war from the start. But it is not important now because everyone agrees it was a bad idea except for the people in charge. They do not want to admit they were wrong.

New polls show that 75 to 80 percent of the world's population thinks the war was a bad idea. Even 80 percent of Iraqis and 70 percent of American soldiers in Iraq think the war was a bad idea. They think the United States should leave Iraq within a year.

The situation in Iraq was already bad before we went there. Now it is even worse. There is no easy way to solve the problem. The United States and the Middle East have different cultures. The United States wanted to bring democracy to Iraq, but the people of Iraq do not want it.

Saddam Hussein was a bad leader, but was the war the best way to stop him? Before we went to war, we should have thought about the good and the bad. The war was like quicksand. We got stuck and now we are in trouble.

I do not see a good reason to stay in Iraq. The government may have ideas about why we should stay, but I do not agree with them. If they say we can leave gradually over a year, I would not be opposed to that. But I do not see a reason why we should not leave now.

In fact, 80 percent of Iraqis think we should leave within a year. They are the people we are trying to help. If they tell us to leave, we should listen. If we leave, we can say we tried to help them. If something goes wrong, we can say they made the decision to leave.

I do not think we will ever be the good guys in the Middle East, but at least we will be better than we are now.

I think there is still a problem with unfair treatment of people because of their sex in the United States. Women have a harder time than men in many jobs. It is like a "glass ceiling" that makes it difficult for women to get ahead. Many people have difficulty accepting women in important positions. This is because of how society has taught them to think. 

In some jobs, like business, it is rare to find a man working under a woman. People think women are not good leaders. But many women are very qualified for important jobs. They have the skills and knowledge to do the work. However, they may not be chosen for a position because of how things have been in the past. It is the same for men in some jobs, like fashion. They may not be taken seriously if they are not like other men who work in fashion. 

If a man wants to stay at home to take care of his children, many people do not understand this. They think a man should work and earn money for the family. But some men want to stay home and take care of their children. This can be hard for them because people do not accept it. 

To change this, we need to be patient. We have made progress, but it takes time. If we push too hard for change, people may resist. It is like a slow process. But we are moving forward. More women are getting important jobs and more men are staying home to care for their children. We need to show the good qualities of people who are often judged unfairly. We should not be too pushy, but we should show people that they are capable and qualified. 

We also have to remember that people from different places and backgrounds may be judged unfairly. For example, someone who grew up on a farm may not have good grammar, but they may be very smart and capable. Other people may judge them because of their grammar. We need to respect and accept people for who they are, not for how they speak or where they come from.

I think they did not make it a crime. 
They made it less serious. 
It is no longer a crime, but more like a traffic ticket. 
You get a warning and do not go to jail. 
This is good because people do not have to worry about getting in trouble for a long time. 
But, some people are still concerned about the future. 
Even if it is not a crime, it can still make it hard to get a job. 
It can still cause problems. 
But, some people think it is a good idea to not spend so much money on arresting people and taking them to court. 
It costs a lot to arrest, take to court, and keep someone in jail. 
So, if a city is in trouble and does not have much money, they might not want to make it legal. 
However, some cities with more open-minded people think it is okay. 
They can use the money they save to help other things, like schools and programs for the elderly. 
It is a good idea because marijuana is not something we want on the streets. 
But it is also about money and how we use our money. 
Some people think it should be sold like cigarettes, but that might be bad because people might smoke and drive. 
It is still not okay in many places to smoke marijuana. 
So, it would be awkward to have it out in the open. 
Alcohol can hurt people's ability to drive, but marijuana can hurt people's lives in other ways. 
Every person reacts differently to substances. 
Some people can handle them easily, but others cannot. 
It makes it hard to say for sure how bad marijuana is.

I say yes. 
Because many things they do are very traditional. 
They have done the same things for a long time. 
It is good to be connected to tradition. 
But it is also important to be flexible and change. 

For example, in the Catholic Church, many people must go to church every week. 
They have strict rules for how things are done. 
Sometimes I feel the Catholic Church looks down on people who do not follow the rules. 
They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. 
They also do not accept people of other religions. 

For example, my parents were from different religions. 
My mom was Episcopalian and my dad was Episcopalian too. 
My mom was a Catholic, but they could not get married in the Catholic Church because of my dad's religion. 

The Catholic teaching is to love others. 
But it is not fair to say to love others and then not accept them. 
I think some Catholic teachings tell you to do things, but the practice of the Church goes against it. 
This is because the practice is old-fashioned, but the Church continues to do it anyway. 

I do not think allowing priests to marry would stop them from doing bad things. 
People who do bad things will keep doing them, no matter what. 
It is not the same to be married as it is to have a child. 
So, it is not likely that allowing priests to be married would prevent bad things from happening.

I am not sure yet about this issue. It is very difficult to say if one side is right or wrong. The problem is between the separation of church and state and how to define marriage. This is a hard problem because it is very sensitive.

I think a civil union is the same as marriage. It is a union between two people. The government should not look at the kind of marriage or if the people were baptized. Marriage is just two people together.

If all states agree on this, they should make it a federal law. But a constitutional amendment to stop gay marriage is not a good idea. The constitution should not be changed for a small issue.

I do not think it is important enough to change the constitution. It is not big enough.

I was raised in a Christian home. I have some thoughts about homosexuality. It is a complicated issue for me. I have many gay friends. I do not agree with their lifestyle, but I think they should be allowed to make their own choices. I do not think the government should decide for everyone. 

Different states have different opinions. Some states are democratic and others are republican. If you live in a democratic state, you agree with their decisions. If you do not like the decision, you can move to a different state. I think homosexuals should have the same rights as heterosexuals. They should be able to get married if a state allows it. 

I already said this, but I will say it again. I do not think President Bush should decide what all states can and cannot do. It is up to each state to decide for itself. 

I think some things should be decided by each state. President Bush will not be in office forever. If a new president does not like his decision, they can change it. Each state should make its own decisions because they will live with the results. It is not the president's job to decide for everyone. 

Do I want a ban on gay marriage? No, I do not.

I don't agree with what you said. Let me explain. Myspace is a public place where people can post things for others to see. If you post something on Myspace, you have to know that others will see it. That includes school officials.

In this case, the school officials checked Myspace to prevent a school shooting. I think that's okay. The school's responsibility is to keep students safe. If they can find something on Myspace that helps them do that, I think that's fine.

School officials can look at Myspace to catch students breaking the rules. But I think that's an invasion of privacy. However, if they use Myspace to make the school a better and safer place, I don't think that's an invasion.

It's like when you post something on the internet. It's hard to control who sees it. I'm careful about what I post because I know it can come back to haunt me.

If you post something bad about someone on the internet, you can get in trouble. And once it's on the internet, it's there forever. School officials shouldn't go on the internet just to catch students, but if they find something that helps keep the school safe, I think that's okay.

My teacher told me that schools have to be careful. They have to make sure students are safe. We practiced what to do in case of an emergency. School officials were just trying to keep the school safe.

They were preventing something bad from happening, like a school shooting. They were doing what they thought was best to keep students safe. That's their job.

I think about the war. At first, I thought it was a good idea. The attack on 9/11 affected me personally. I wanted to do something about it. I thought we should go to the country where the attack came from and cause some trouble. But I think we did not think about the long-term results. We went there without a clear plan. I believe this was a mistake. 

Now, I do not think the war was a good idea. The people in that country are fighting each other. They cannot fight with us too. I do not think our presence there will make a difference. They will continue to fight each other. 

Because of 9/11, I have lost interest in what is happening in that country. I see the people there as not truly human. They fight and cannot work together. We should have thought before we went there. We did not know what to expect. The way they fight is different from how we fight. I think they want us to leave, not help them. 

I think we went there for revenge. President Bush wanted to go to war in Iraq. The people wanted revenge for 9/11. I understand why he did it, but I do not think it was the right decision. We could not just let Iraq do what it wanted and then expect us to rebuild it. 

We did not have a clear plan for what to do in Iraq. We did not know what we were doing. We should have been more careful and thought more about the consequences. I do not think we can change the people in Iraq. They will always be like that. We cannot stay in Iraq forever. If we leave, the country will probably collapse. We are hurting ourselves by staying there. We should leave and stop fighting.
